rooms.description: An open-plan living area with Scandinavian minimalistic decor and a small foyer for entry.
A modern, functional kitchen designed with clean lines and ample storage. It is positioned to the right of the living room per Vastu guidelines (eastern side).
A dedicated gym space with built-in equipment storage and ventilation for optimal air flow. It is designed away from the bedroom areas.
A quiet, well-lit study area or library space with access to natural light and views of nature. Positioned for optimal concentration according to Vastu principles.
A flexible space that can be used as an additional living area or guest room.

openings.description: Main entrance aligns with Vastu principles ensuring energy flow.

openings.location: eastern wall of living room and kitchen
openings.description: Windows on the east side allow morning sunlight to energize the space, in line with Vastu guidelines.
Interconnecting door for fluid movement between spaces.
Provides ventilation in the workout area.

rooms.description: A cozy yet spacious bedroom designed with Scandinavian aesthetics and Vastu-compliant orientation (south-east direction).
An additional sleeping area for guests or family members, located adjacent to the master bedroom.

openings.location: between master bedroom and guest room
openings.description: Connecting door for easy access between rooms.
Window placement ensures good airflow and natural light in accordance with Vastu principles.

rooms.description: An expansive rooftop terrace with seating areas and greenery for relaxation. Designed to maintain privacy while offering panoramic views.

openings.description: Stairs provide access from the first floor to the rooftop terrace, designed for easy evacuation and aesthetic appeal.

openings.location: private gym area on ground floor leading to storage
openings.description: A discreet ladder connecting a private gym utility space with the building's upper areas.
